name: www
description: A website for Raritan Public Library.
browserslist: >= 0.1% in US, last 3 years, not dead

scripts.dev: npm run gen && npm run pre-dev && parcel src/*.pug && npm run post-dev
scripts.redev: npm run clear && npm run gen && npm run pre-dev && npm run images && parcel src/*.pug && npm run post-dev
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run gen && parcel build src/*.pug && npm run images && npm run push-serv
scripts.commit: npm run push-git && npm run build
